title: Les Batisseurs de Cathedrales
description: Episode 11 of Series “Il Etait Une Fois L'homme” (= “Once Upon a Time Man”). Following the fall of the Carolingian Empire, Europe at the beginning of Xth century lives in a climate of constant insecurity. It is in this climate that great advances in architecture are made, in particular in vaulting techniques. Other topics include: the Crusades. See also: 'Le temps de cathedrales' (Series #S002025)  Credits: Director, writer, Albert Barille ; photography, Jean-Louis Karcher ; art direction, Philippe Landrot, Rene Borg ; graphic research, Jean Barbaud. Cast: Roger Carel, Francine Laine, Pierre Trabaud, Henri Djanik [original French narration].
related_objects: Series; S002033; Il Etait Une Fois L'homme = Once Upon a Time Man; Active; 1978
